reservationsToPurchase.description: List of reservations that are being purchased in this exchange.

reservationsToExchange.description: List of reservations that are being returned in this exchange.

sessionId.description: SessionId that was returned by CalculateExchange API.

reservationsToPurchase.description: List of reservations that are being purchased in this exchange.

reservationsToExchange.description: List of reservations that are being returned in this exchange.

id.description: Fully qualified id of the ReservationOrder being returned

ReturnRequestScope.description: Indicates whether it is a reservation return or entire order return

ReservationToReturn.description: To be present only if ReturnRequestScope = Reservation and null otherwise

reservationId.description: Id of the reservation that is being returned, This is reservation lineitem and should not be commerce line item. Example /providers/Microsoft.Capacity/reservationorders/{reservationId}/reservations/{itemId}

resourceType.description: The type of resource the SKU applies to.

billingPlans.description: The billing plan options available for this SKU.

terms.description: Available reservation terms for this resource

items.description: The set of locations that the SKU is available. If not specified, the SKU is available in all locations.

name.description: An invariant to describe the feature.

value.description: An invariant if the feature is measured by quantity.

values.description: The value of restrictions. If the restriction type is set to location. This would be different locations where the SKU is restricted.

PaymentStatus.description: Describes whether the payment is completed, failed, cancelled or scheduled in the future.

PaymentDetail.description: Information about payment related to a reservation order.

dueDate.description: Date when the payment needs to be done.

paymentDate.description: Date when the transaction is completed. Is null when it is scheduled.

pricingCurrencyTotal.description: Amount in pricing currency. Tax not included.

billingCurrencyTotal.description: Amount charged in Billing currency. Tax not included. Is null for future payments

billingAccount.description: Shows the Account that is charged for this payment.

ReservationOrderBillingPlanInformation.description: Information describing the type of billing plan for this reservation.

pricingCurrencyTotal.description: Amount of money to be paid for the Order. Tax is not included.

startDate.description: Date when the billing plan has started.

nextPaymentDueDate.description: For recurring billing plans, indicates the date when next payment will be processed. Null when total is paid off.

displayName.description: Friendly name for user to easily identified the reservation.

requestDateTime.description: This is the DateTime when the reservation was initially requested for purchase.

createdDateTime.description: This is the DateTime when the reservation was created.

expiryDate.description: This is the date when the Reservation will expire.

location.description: The Azure Region where the reserved resource lives.

pricingCurrencyTotal.description: Amount that Microsoft uses for record. Used during refund for calculating refund limit. Tax is not included. This is locked price 30 days before expiry.

billingCurrencyTotal.description: Currency and amount that customer will be charged in customer's local currency for renewal purchase. Tax is not included.
Currency and amount that customer will be charged in customer's local currency. Tax is not included.

isBillingPartnerManaged.description: True if billing is managed by Microsoft Partner. Used only for CSP accounts.

reservationOrderId.description: GUID that represents reservation order that can be placed after calculating price.

skuTitle.description: Title of SKU that is being purchased.

skuDescription.description: Description of SKU that is being purchased.

pricingCurrencyTotal.description: Amount that Microsoft uses for record. Used during refund for calculating refund limit. Tax is not included.

displayName.description: Friendly name for user to easily identify the reservation

effectiveDateTime.description: DateTime of the Reservation starting when this version is effective from.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: DateTime of the last time the Reservation was updated.

expiryDate.description: This is the date when the Reservation will expire.

skuDescription.description: Description of the SKU in english.

renewSource.description: Reservation Id of the reservation from which this reservation is renewed. Format of the resource Id is /providers/Microsoft.Capacity/reservationOrders/{reservationOrderId}/reservations/{reservationId}.

renewDestination.description: Reservation Id of the reservation which is purchased because of renew. Format of the resource Id is /providers/Microsoft.Capacity/reservationOrders/{reservationOrderId}/reservations/{reservationId}.

splitDestinations.description: List of destination Resource Id that are created due to split. Format of the resource Id is /providers/Microsoft.Capacity/reservationOrders/{reservationOrderId}/reservations/{reservationId}

splitSource.description: Resource Id of the Reservation from which this is split. Format of the resource Id is /providers/Microsoft.Capacity/reservationOrders/{reservationOrderId}/reservations/{reservationId}

mergeDestination.description: Reservation Resource Id Created due to the merge. Format of the resource Id is /providers/Microsoft.Capacity/reservationOrders/{reservationOrderId}/reservations/{reservationId}

mergeSources.description: Resource Ids of the Source Reservation's merged to form this Reservation. Format of the resource Id is /providers/Microsoft.Capacity/reservationOrders/{reservationOrderId}/reservations/{reservationId}

reservedResourceProperties.description: Properties specific to each reserved resource type. Not required if not applicable.

quantities.description: List of the quantities in the new reservations to create.

reservationId.description: Resource id of the reservation to be split. Format of the resource id should be /providers/Microsoft.Capacity/reservationOrders/{reservationOrderId}/reservations/{reservationId}

sources.description: Format of the resource id should be /providers/Microsoft.Capacity/reservationOrders/{reservationOrderId}/reservations/{reservationId}

location.description: The Azure Region where the reserved resource lives.

message.description: The message giving detailed information about the status code.

nextLink.description: Url to get the next page of reservationOrders.
Url to get the next page of reservations.
Url to get the next page of reservations
Url to get the next page of items.

InstanceFlexibility.description: Turning this on will apply the reservation discount to other VMs in the same VM size group. Only specify for VirtualMachines reserved resource type.

AppliedScopes.description: List of the subscriptions that the benefit will be applied. Do not specify if AppliedScopeType is Shared.

BillingScopeId.description: Subscription that will be charged for purchasing Reservation

Renew.description: Setting this to true will automatically purchase a new reservation on the expiration date time.

ReservationQuantity.description: Quantity of the SKUs that are part of the Reservation. Must be greater than zero.

ReservedResourceType.description: The type of the resource that is being reserved.

currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 3-letter currency code for the currency used by this purchase record.

CalculateExchangeRequestParameter.description: Request containing the refunds and purchases that need to be executed.

ExchangeRequestParameter.name: body
ExchangeRequestParameter.description: Request containing the refunds and purchases that need to be executed.

PurchaseParameter.name: body
PurchaseParameter.description: Information needed for calculate or purchase reservation

MergeParameter.name: body
MergeParameter.description: Information needed for commercial request for a reservation

PatchParameter.name: parameters
PatchParameter.description: Information needed to patch a reservation item

SplitParameter.name: body
SplitParameter.description: Information needed to Split a reservation item

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: Supported version for this document is 2020-10-01

ExpandRenewPropertiesParameter.name: expand
ExpandRenewPropertiesParameter.description: Supported value of this query is renewProperties

ReservedResourceTypeIdParameter.name: reservedResourceType
ReservedResourceTypeIdParameter.description: The type of the resource for which the skus should be provided.

LocationIdParameter.name: location
LocationIdParameter.description: Filters the skus based on the location specified in this parameter. This can be an azure region or global
